custom_css: .article__header {width: var(--container-max-width-minus-gutters); max-width: calc(100% - var(--container-gutter) * 2); margin-top: 70px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;}

@media (min-width: 741px) {.article__inner {margin: 0; flex-direction: row; align-items: flex-start; gap: 40px; } .article__info {position: sticky; top: 140px; } .article__content {max-width: initial; }}
.section__header {max-width: initial; padding-top: 70px; margin-bottom: calc(var(--container-gutter) * 1.75); border-top: 1px solid rgba(var(--text-color), 0.75);}
